extendedInfo.description: Sleep Timer can stop media after a set amount of time.Listen to music as you fall asleep, watch TV using SlingBox, listen to the radio, watch a movie. Sleep Timer can stop all these and more from waking you up by turning them off while you sleep.Features- Works with **video** as well as audio applications- Customize what happens when the timer ends- Stops music from playing instead of just turning the volume downNote: Video applications do not need any actions for Sleep Timer to stop them.  Try different actions with audio applications using the 1 minute timer to find an action that works.Many audio apps do not have a "Stop" function; "Play/Pause" usually works.To delete an application from the main list, long press and press delete.Have Honeycomb or Ice Cream Sandwich? Try Sleep Timer for Android 3.0+!There is a rare issue with the timer freezing. Still investigating the cause.

reviews.title: One little feature missing...
reviews.comment: App works as described for me (T-Mobile G2/HTC Desire Z)... Just wish it had the option to disable the \"Good Night!\" screen once the timer has run down so I could still see my clock in the middle of the night without hitting the back button... Otherwise perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unless
reviews.comment: It has glitches. It will not shut off pandora. It works okay with audible. Up to 30 min, Ivan do that with the audible program. I have found other little glitches. Still does well I need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good but needs some tweaking.
reviews.comment: Closes applications fine. Needs to have option to close sleep timer also as app keeps device awake through the night draining battery.
reviews.author: sMiLEy sLOth

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: good app, working with fm radio on HTC desire. Would be even better if I was able to setup a shortcut to the action that I have created within the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What I was looking for
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Works within all apps. Excellent. TuneIn radio has its own sleep timer. I use it for jazz radio.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What I think
reviews.comment: Its really helpful. It sets a timer on any app. But the timer are pre set times and it seems that the remove apps from the commands list doesn\'t work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mixed review
reviews.comment: On my HTC EVO 4G phone (Gingerbread) it works great. On my HTC EVO View tablet (Honeycomb) it makes my tablet go bonkers when my Ott light is on, but phone doesn\'t. Uninstalling on tablet :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app, love that it can either pause or stop completely. No encountered problems, so far. Although I\'d love to see a smoother UI. Overall good concept.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for, and it works really well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: HTC desire. Works a treat with generic play/pause action on standard HTC music player. Excellent for my audio books. Use menu button to add player.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Saddening
reviews.comment: Good thing I tested it first. I got a \"good night\" msg but Pandora was still playing long after. I was hoping it would close everything out. Oh well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on samsung
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t turn off the radio on my galaxy ace - just brings up a screen saying goodnight and leaves the radio running.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Free and no special permissions is awesome. A little awkward to set up for first time but very easy after initial setup. Easily 5 stars despite that. I use this app every night for Pandora.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: terrible
reviews.comment: does not work for the 5 different apps  I tried it for.. please update this app so it works
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work..
reviews.comment: Will freeze 20 minutes or so into the countdown. Its able to stop pandora on 1 minute. But not useful for actual use. Epic-4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and works fine with Winamp
reviews.comment: But I\'d prefer to be able to set the exact length by myself. Thanks for the app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app. Hdmi out on rooted EVO, netflix, and hulu plus to fall asleep! Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thunderbolt
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work on my pandora...the music just kept on going. Good idea though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Found one that silenced pandora. What I needed.
reviews.author: A Google User
